turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, good afternoon. I was hoping to place a Starbucks pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure let's get that started for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a grande cafe latte with 2% milk, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any sweetener or syrup for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two Splendas, please, if you could.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks did you want me to place this order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 130 East Seneca.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want a grande cafe latte with 2% milk with 2 splendas at starbucks 130 east seneca.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be $3.40. did you want me to charge the card on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set. the drink will be ready at 130 seneca for pick up in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am all set. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, you're very welcome.
